players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Charlie is the mafioso I investigated last night, and I believe he's hiding something."
Charlie: "I am the mafioso and I killed Alice last night. Bob investigated me, but I didn't kill anyone tonight."
